column3: “I never heard about this before going to shasta California, but I live in Redding. Naturally I picked up the redding og hash and put that on some alien og and I'll tell you I smoke plenty, this stuff was an immediate feel, pain relief and stress too, quick.”

“Hard hitting, fast acting, heavy in the game strain...first time trying and BANGGG. Everyday heavy strain user gives it two thumbs up very potent. Well balanced plant. But will knock you down if your not careful.”
“A good social high. I got a little too introspective at first, but mellowed out quite nicely into a warm happiness. Made for some interesting conversations.”
